title: How to Install a K&N Air Intake (Part # 69-2545TP)
description: This air intake modification can be done in just a few simple steps. Watch the install on a 2011-2013 Dodge Challenger, Chrysler 300 and 2012 & 2013 Dodge Charger 6.4L.
tags: K&N Air Intake System, Dodge Challenger, how to install, cold air intake, Charger, Chrysler 300

asset.title: 2011 - 2014 Dodge Challenger, 2012 - 2014 Chrysler 300 & Dodge Charger 6.4L Air Intake Installation
asset.description:
See how easy it is to add more performance to the 2011-2013 Dodge Challenger, Chrysler 300 and 2012 & 2013 Dodge Charger 6.4L.

http://www.knfilters.com/search/product.aspx?prod=69-2545TP

K&N 69-2545TP air intake modification showed an estimated gain of 22 horsepower at 5216 RPM when tested on the K&N dynamometer. 

K&N 69-2545TP fits the following: 
2014 DODGE CHARGER 6.4L V8 
2014 DODGE CHALLENGER 6.4L V8
2014 CHRYSLER 300 6.4L V8
2013 DODGE CHARGER 6.4L V8 
2013 DODGE CHALLENGER 6.4L V8 
2013 CHRYSLER 300 6.4L V8 
2012 DODGE CHARGER 6.4L V8 
2012 DODGE CHALLENGER 6.4L V8 
2012 CHRYSLER 300 6.4L V8 
2011 DODGE CHALLENGER 6.4L V8

Go to http://www.knfilters.com/search/product.aspx?prod=69-2545TP for an up to date application list.

To search for your own vehicle's corresponding cold air intake and air filter visit
http://www.KNfilters.com
asset.author: KNfilters
